name: Team Racing League
description: In this unique 3 on 3 racegame, it's up to you and your teammates to finish before the opposing team does. Mastering the high quality vehicle handling, special abilities, and optimal Team Strategy are key to win the race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM: 1792 MB NVIDIA GTX 460, ATI Radeon 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM: 2 GB NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
